introduction: At 22, Ron still lives with his parents. He barely knows the daylight hours and his nights are divided between his job as editor of wedding videos, chats on the Internet and futuristic fantasies. One night all the elements he toys with converge and, for the first time in his life, he is willing to risk a real in-person encounter.--First Prize – Munich International festival of Film schools, Germany, ‏‏2000Special Mention – The Jerusalem Film Festival, Israel, 2000Honorable Mention–Humboldt International Film Festival, USA 2001Best Student Production Award –Melbourne International Film Festival, Australia, 2001.
